I have an idea for a resource planning tool that goes beyond the native Workload view.\n\nQuestions for developers who've built marketplace apps:\n1. What's the development experience like? Good docs? Helpful support?\n2. How does the review/approval process work?\n3. What's the revenue model? Revenue sharing?\n4. How many users can you realistically expect?\n5. What technology stack works best?\n6. Any gotchas or limitations I should know about?"]}]}]

has ~800 installs. About 60 are paid subscribers at $10/user/month."]}],["$","p","2",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":["Monthly revenue: ~$3,500 before monday.com's 20% cut = ~$2,800 net."]}],["$","p","3",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":["It took 6 months of development and 3 months to get traction. I'm a solo developer."]}],["$","p","4",{"className":"mb-3 last:mb-0","children":["Is it worth it? As a side project, absolutely.
